Text: btw. to play ape files in winamp just install monkey's audio wich includes the latest plugin for winamp.

This is a fantastic album, however Loreena McKennit is unfortunatly still an unknown performer for most people. 

... but why this strange encoder?
"but why this strange encoder?" ... so you can burn your own audio cd exactly as the original or compress it in whatever other format you like (more at http://www.losslesswold.net).
